summary: My very first mod inspired by and a tribute to Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice!
descriptionHtml:
I know I have been gone a while but I haven't stopped working on this. It's now a much bigger project than just a sword and there will be an original armor set and a character preset coming very soon! I'm still learning the CK but I would love to implement a quest as well.


So this is the first official mod I've ever made and it's a sword that is very much inspired by the game Hellblade! I'm so excited to play Ninja Theory's next game! If they happen to see this, I want to say I love you guys and thank you!

I started making this around October of 2015. The reason it has taken me so long to finish it is because I couldn't find a tutorial for people that used Blender to make their assets (let alone a decent tutorial in general). Not only that, but I had trouble learning Nifskope. A tutorial I had found a while back, was confusing me and not very good at explaining things. Anyway, about 2 weeks ago, I found this tutorial and it worked! Thank you BlazeLeeDragon!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MwJDy5rNTmo&index=76&list=WL

I want to improve the sword as well as add an armor set and a quest (once I learn how to do that).

Feedback (constructive criticism) is welcome! I hope you like it ;)
author: LoveMaskuraid

files.name: Drengskapr
